name: Domino Frenzy
description:
What if looking at your stack of dominoes collapsing was even more satisfying than playing?

In Domino Frenzy, your goal is to successfully place more and more dominos and watch them fall! If you are strong enough, unlock golden dominoes by placing them on the perfect spot and awesome structures on your domino line!

One-tap easy-to-learn controls with funny visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics.
